1.title: Costa Rican Surf Camp
1.plot: Five time Costa Rican surf champion Jose Solano takes a group of friends on the surfing adventure of their lifetimes.

2.title: Cow Girl
2.plot: A trip to the Lazy K Bar Ranch, where women learn how to be cowgirls. Included: barrel racing, line dancing and trail riding.

3.title: Zero-G. Corvette
3.plot: Three fantasy campers experience what it's like to be weightless in space and receive training from a veteran astronaut. Also: Corvette street racing.

4.title: Sailing Camp
4.plot: Four fantasy campers are taught to sail in the British Virgin Islands by Olympic gold medalists and competitive racing champions.

5.title: Mario Andretti Las Vegas Experience
5.plot: A pair of brothers from New York get to live out their dream of learning Formula One Racing from the legendary Mario Andretti at the Las Vegas Motor Speedway.

6.title: Water Skiing Camp
6.plot: A seven-day water-skiing camp in Acapulco.

7.title: Rock and Roll and NBA Legends
7.plot: Campers in New York City learn to rock and roll from Roger Daltrey of The Who. Also: a four-day basketball camp with NBA legends.

1.title: Wayne Gretzky Hockey Camp
1.plot: An adventure on ice with three fans of "The Great One"---Wayne Gretzky---who get a chance to drill with their hero at an arena in Scottsdale, Ariz. Later they all catch a Phoenix Coyotes ball game in Gretzky's private suite.

2.title: Chris Evert and Beringer Master Series Food and Wine
2.plot: Tennis lessons from pros at a camp run by Chris Evert in Boca Raton (Fla.); cooking tips at a get-together in California's Napa Valley. Also: dinner at the French Laundry.

3.title: MIGs Over Moscow Camp
3.plot: Breaking the sound barrier is a dream realized by an Illinois physician, who flies in a MiG-25 Foxbat jet at 80,000 ft. over Russia. Back on the ground, the doctor takes in the Moscow sights, including a bustling flea market.

4.title: Space Camp, Mountain Climbing Camp
4.plot: A ride in a space simulator re-creates the blastoff of an astronaut for a fantasizer at a U.S. facility; mountain climbing tests novices, scaling heights of up to 13,770 ft. at Grand Teton National Park in western Wyoming.

6.title: Dave Lewis, Red Wings Hockey
6.plot: On the ice rink in Moscow in a competition with past Russian hockey stars. The NHL's Dave Lewis captains the U.S. fantasy team, who also take a behind-the-scenes tour of the Kremlin and visit the czar's palace in St. Petersburg.

7.title: B-17 Flight Camp, Drag Racing
7.plot: A look at a WWII bomber's adventure over an airfield in Oshkosh, Wis.; and experiences in a very fast lane at a Florida speedway, where veteran driver Frank Hawley supervises novices reaching speeds up to 150 mph.

8.title: Photography Fantasy Camp
8.plot: A rain-forest adventure in Costa Rica with nature photographer Roy Toft, who uses scenic vistas as backdrops for portraits of diverse wildlife, including such birds as scarlet macaws, chestnut toucans and other creatures.

9.title: Sankey Rodeo, Covert Ops
9.plot: A bull-riding introduction from award-winning rodeo professionals. Also: insight into the undercover world, including firearm skills and lessons in self-defense techniques; secrets behind a high-speed car chase.

10.title: John Newcombe, Tennis
10.plot: Court lessons from a master in Texas, where guests spend six days (and some $4200) learning forehand and backhand techniques. Also: a tennis excursion at an Antigua resort that offers other activities on the Caribbean Sea.

1.title: Jean-Michel Cousteau, Trapeze Camp
1.plot: A snorkeling adventure off Catalina Island with Jean-Michael Cousteau, an ecology advocate and son of famed oceanographer Jacques Cousteau. Also: attending a trapeze school in New York City, where the Manhattan skyline is a backdrop.

2.title: Fairway Fantasy Camp
2.plot: A thrill for amateur golfers, who play with pros from the men's and women's circuits at a six-day camp that costs the duffers $12,500. The pro players include John Daly, Annika Sorenstam, Laura Diaz, and Rocco Mediate.

3.title: New York Yankees Camp
3.plot: Playing ball with champions: the N.Y. Yankees, hosting a camp for fantasy campers who get to wear the pinstripes in a six-day adventure with team greats of today and yesteryear. The finale pits the campers vs. the legends in a dream game.

4.title: Paula Newby-Fraser Triathlon
4.plot: A grueling regimen of swimming, biking and running is conducted in Kona, Hawaii, by Ironman champ Paula Newby-Fraser.

6.title: Tour De France
6.plot: On the road with bicyclists taking the Tour de France path on a 12-day adventure through rolling countryside and over scenic mountains.

7.title: Hoop Dreams
7.plot: Hoops fans play alongside the NBA's Vlade Divac and Peja Stojakovic during a weekend outing in Sacramento.

8.title: Fly Fishing
8.plot: A two-day camp in Thermopolis, Wyo. Included: tips on fly fishing and whitewater rafting.

9.title: Racing and Poker
9.plot: Included: the Mario Andretti Racing School for car racing; Howard Lederer and Annie Duke's No Limit Hold 'Em Fantasy Camp for poker players.

10.title: Architecture: Great White Shark
10.plot: A trip to Frank Lloyd Wright's Oak Park studio in Illinois, and a day long expedition to the Farallon Islands off the San Francisco coast.

-1.title: USC Trojan Football Fantasy Camp
-1.plot: Football for "grown-up kids," who learn gridiron skills from USC coach Pete Carroll in a three-day event that costs each entrant about $1700. The best moment: actual competition held at L.A.'s historic Coliseum, the Trojans' home field.

imdb.plot outline: From racecar driving to rock stars, Dodgers camp to tossing a football with Joe Montana or playing in the Super Bowl, Fine Living's Fantasy Camp profiles the camps for adults that make dreams come true. Follow camp participants as they embark on this once-in-a-lifetime experience of truly living out their passions!
imdb.title: Fantasy Camp
plot: From racecar driving to rock stars, Dodgers camp to tossing a football with Joe Montana or playing in the Super Bowl, Fine Living's _Fantasy Camp_ (qv) profiles the camps for adults that make dreams come true. Follow camp participants as they embark on this once-in-a-lifetime experience of truly living out their passions!
